snippet.title: Mesmer PC Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Mesmer is a unique revolution simulator where every encounter matters. 
Coming 16th October 2020 to:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1308760/Mesmer/
GOG
Humble Store
Utomik

Mesmer! The pearl of the old world. At least it used to be. But this city has failed its people. Unite the people, spark a revolution and storm the castle. Build a better Mesmer.
